title: Retroactive reward for governance voting
body:
Proposal:
Reward current PREMIA token holders who have participated in governance voting. 

Proposed reward to be :
Airdrop(s) of PREMIA/xPREMIA tokens based on account address fulfilling the below;
- voted in at least 1 governance vote and 
- Holding, staking and/or having locked PREMIA tokens on snapshot.

Airdrop(s) amount and timing to be evaluated and decided by CORE team in consideration of other factors.

Additional notes for CORE team consideration: 
- Fixed airdrop amount per wallet based on eligibility and airdrop amount does not change based on amount of PREMIA token holdings. 
- xPREMIA tokens have been discussed to be the preferred airdrop in #proposal-drafts

Reason:
Governance voting is a core component for PREMIA and the aim of this is to encourage PREMIA holders to actively participate in the Project and vote in upcoming snapshots. This is also a reward to those still active in the community and who are clearly committed to the long term success of the protocol.
author: 0x26b94A72D2Aa4197441BF7B4c2C80dfB8F34cBC8
